collection-where-radio.legend: From where were you asked to collect your BRP?
collection-where-radio.hint: This could have been from a Post Office branch or a sponsor, such as your legal representative, employer, university or school.

reason-radio.legend: Why couldn't you collect your BRP?

under-age.legend: I am under 18 and attempted collection without my responsible adult
under-age.label: I am under 18 and attempted collection without my responsible adult

non-identity.legend: I could not prove my identity
non-identity.label: I could not prove my identity

others-identity.legend: Someone attempted to collect my BRP on my behalf, but was unable to
others-identity.label: Someone attempted to collect my BRP on my behalf, but was unable to

passport-family.legend: The vignette (sticker) in my passport is not linked to my family
passport-family.label: The vignette (sticker) in my passport is not linked to my family

which-post-office.legend: I don't know which Post Office I need to collect my BRP from
which-post-office.label: I don't know which Post Office I need to collect my BRP from

nominated-nationality.label: Country of nationality.
nominated-nationality.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

delivery-details.label: If the courier could have problems delivering to this address, for example there's no door number, then let us know and we'll contact them. (optional)

nationality.label: Country of nationality.
nationality.hint: Start typing your nationality to create a short list of options. Then press up or down to navigate between options.

use-address.label: I want to be contacted by post
